abstract.para: The kvm-server-manage script is used to manage the &kvm; server container and its dependent services on &productname;. This article describes each subcommand of the script. kvm-server-manage is installed alongside the &kvm; server container with:

listitem.para: Ensures the monolithic libvirtd daemon is disabled (if present)
Starts the &kvm; server container if it is not running already
Enables and (re)starts the modular libvirt daemons that are run inside the &kvm; server container
Performs the same actions as kvm-server-manage enable in addition to restarting the &kvm; server container
Disables and stops the &kvm; server container and all libvirt daemons
Stops the running &kvm; server container and all libvirt daemons
Verifies that all required services are active. Any inactive services will be shown and can be addressed by the administrator
